post.body: burger was a disaster. Mine was muy delicioso!
I've always said that. Kinda weird to know how someone's gonna age.
@NFTP: "Grid"? What's this "grid" you speak of? I'm no part of any "grid".
How long are you @ Perk? I might be in the area.
kick ass + take names, brother!
Tank Girl is freakin' rad. Lori Petty! Ice T as a mutant kangaroo!
Track pants + a Banana Republic sweater? Rly?
4 paintings I've been laboring through, finally done. Breakthru today, looks awesome. Makes up for ystrday, kinda.
My guy is home, safe as houses. All is right w/ the world.
Waiting for the BF @ the airport bar, sketching, + they're playing Kings of Convenience. A sign of things getting awesome.
Nothing I tried to do today has been any good. I don't care, I'm gonna go pick up my fella from the airport. Then it'll all be awesome.
Fucking stylist double booked + left me swinging w/out apology. I am doomed to grow my hair shaggy.
Current Listening: "Just A Touch Of Love" by Slave. Makes me wanna spend my life on rollerskates.
Current Listening: "8th Wonder" by the Sugar Hill Gang. We scream, we shout, we turn his function out.
Ruined 2 pieces I as working on. 2 weeks of work fucked up in 15 seconds.
Prepping stencils. Cutting stencils. Paintings starting to look "right". Maybe some photos soon.
Bacon...and eggs fried in bacon fat. Breakfast WIN! Heart disease Fail.
3 paintings done today, more in the works.
Atoms!
Daddy's making voodoo, y'all.
